transport.question: I have wheels and go 'beep beep'! Little ones ride in me.

hints.text: 👪 I take children to school.
🛑 I usually stop at a yellow light.
🚏 You wait for me at a specific place on the road.

transport.question: I float on water and carry people or things across the sea.

hints.text: 🌊 I need a large body of water.
⚓️ I have an anchor to stay in one place.
🚢 I am much bigger than a rowboat.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky and take people to far away places.

hints.text: ☁️ I fly above the clouds.
💺 I have many seats for passengers.
✈️ You need a ticket to ride me.

transport.question: I go on tracks and carry many people. I can be very long.

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a specific path.
🚊 I have lots of carriages.
🚂 I often travel between cities.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to move me.

hints.text: 🦶 You need to pedal to make me go.
🔔 I often have a bell.
🚲 You can ride me in the park.

transport.question: I zoom through the air and can go to outer space!

hints.text: 🚀 I use a lot of fuel to launch.
👩‍🚀 Astronauts travel in me.
🌌 I can travel to the moon.

transport.question: I'm like a car, but people pay to ride in me and I have a meter.

hints.text: 🚦 You can wave me down on the street.
🚕 I'm often yellow.
📍 I take you where you want to go.

transport.question: I am a vehicle that helps to put out fires.

hints.text: 🚨 I have a siren.
👨‍🚒 Firefighters ride in me.
💧 I spray water.

transport.question: I am like a motorbike but I have three wheels.

hints.text: ⚙️ I am good for carrying things.
🇮🇳 I am popular in some countries.
🛵 Sometimes I am called an auto-rickshaw.

transport.question: I am a fast train that travels under cities.

hints.text: 🚇 I use underground tunnels.
🗺️ You can use me to travel quickly in a big city.
🛤️ I'm also called a subway.

animal.question: I say 'Meow', and I like to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🐈‍⬛ Some people keep me as a pet.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch! What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🎾 I'm a good friend and companion.
🐕 I come in many different sizes and colors.

animal.question: I quack and waddle. I swim in ponds and lakes. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I like to eat seeds and plants.
🐣 Baby version of me is called a duckling.
🦆 I am a water bird.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. I love to eat carrots! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat vegetables.
🌱 I like to eat plants and leaves.
🐇 Some people keep me as a pet, others live in wild.

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🥩 I am a carnivore.
🌳 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I never forget! What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.
🐘 I am a very big animal.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes, and I look like a horse. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I live in Africa.
🌿 I eat grass.
🐎 My stripes are unique to each of us, like fingerprints.

animal.question: I hiss and slither. I don't have legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I shed my skin.
🥚 I lay eggs.
🐁 Some of me eat mice.

animal.question: I have a pouch, and I hop around Australia. What am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I am native to Australia.
🌿 I eat plants and grasses.
🦘 I carry my babies in a pouch.

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am an invertebrate.
💦 I can squirt ink when I'm scared.
🌊 I don't have any bones.
